title: Free Agent Frenzy Begins + Brady Returns, Cooper Traded - Fantasy Football Podcast for 3/15
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a jam-packed, exciting new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of big NFL news including Tom Brady returning! Plus, Amari Cooper traded to the Browns, and the fantasy football fallout from all the big free agent signings! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for March 15th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(03:10) - NFL News
(03:15) - Tom Brady Returns
(08:15) - Deshaun Watson
(11:05) - Amari Cooper, Jarvis Landry
(12:50) - Michael Gallup
(16:35) - Free Agent Frenzy 
(16:45) - Dolphins: Chase Edmonds, Cedrick Wilson
(20:30) - Cardinals: James Conner, Zach Ertz
(25:25) - Jaguars: Christian Kirk, Zay Jones, Evan Engram
(36:15) - Lions: D.J. Chark
(37:35) - Steelers: Mitchell Trubisky
(43:10) - Jets: Tevin Coleman, C.J. Uzomah, Braxton Berrios
(44:30) - Mo Alie-Cox, Will Dissly

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube

Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
